name: 1000000 - Skin Hatcher for MCPE
description:
Are you a serious MineCrafter? Are you a supersonic tapper? Would you like to have a brand new unique MineCraft skin for free? Now or never: get an unseen and unused MineCraft outfit only for having fun! Download 1 000 000 now -

Get this universal game for free and make the blockegg hatch up! If you hit our magical Egg for 1 million times, you'll receive a brand new MineCraft skin. Tap it with your fingers, punch it with a pickaxe, hit it with a sword or shake it with an Earthquake: start the final countdown and be the first who reaches the 1 000 000 clashes and hatches all the secrets! Turn your aggressivity into a unique MineCraft look! Enjoy the destruction and the amazing 8bit retro synth sounds in the background. Share your progress with your friends on Facebook or Twitter - let them envy your supercool MineCraft character!

Do you want more? Catch it, hatch it and then we give you the rest of it!

!GET IT for FREE!

This is not an official Mojang app. LumiNet. is not associated or connected with Mojang AB. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers
